comments.raw_text:
Please provide persistent folder ids for add-on developers so they don't have to manage renaming and moving of folders if they store folder-specific preferences.

This can be a problem for IMAP, but as Thunderbird downloads folders it regards as new, the messages could be compared to other folders of the same account.
